extendedInfo.description: STMicroelectronicsâ "ST op-amps" application allows you to select the appropriate operational amplifiers, comparators, high speed amplifiers and current sensing for your application using the product selector. Datasheets can be downloaded to provide more information about each parts.The application provides additional information such as the most used schematics, compensation methods or package mechanical dimensions.This application contains interactive schematics :- inverting configuration- non-inverting configuration- low pass filter- high pass filter- differential configuration- summing configuration- comparator with hysteresisMain features - Op-amp product selector- Comparator product selector- High speed amplifier product selector- Current sensing product selector- Schematics library- Interactive schematics- Application notes- Package mechanical drawings and data- Links to ST website

reviews.title: Good help for me
